skills.skill: PLC (Allen Bradley PLCs, Device Net, ControlNet Point I/O, and Allen Bradley VFDs)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and implement control systems (logic software and hardware) for machine and integrated system requirements.
Perform onsite PLC & HMI changes and maintain the plant OT/IT environment.
Collaborate with key stakeholders to define the scope of projects and prepare project specifications.
Acquire and negotiate contractor bids, manage and support capital projects.
Understand piping and instrument diagrams, wiring diagrams, vendor manuals, and appropriate ISA standards and practices.
Follow OSHA and safety regulations, communicate safety issues to management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or Computer Science
